Teltoli / Kit

*Teltoli nodded grimly and picked up a second gun, fastening straps round her arms so they wouldn't come off and it was easier to hold and fire. With she ran off down the hallway and into the battle. The first enemy she sees is ZARDUS, so she runs a few quick paces and fires 3 shots of a flamethrower in quick succesion, aimed at his chest*

-----------

*Kit looks outraged as Sinester runs from her, shouting after him in a mocking voice* "Coward!! I'll get you later!"

*She transformed back into otter mode, and swam the lake, coming to shore. With a quick shake she dried herself off and pricked her ears up. She heard battle sounds, and a slow grin crossed over her face*

*Kit transformed into robot mode and held out a lethal looking gun. And with that she raced closer to the fight (at the Ark)*
